question: Who become the second Indian Javelin player wins the gold at the World Para Athletics Championships?
explanation: Para-athlete Sundar Singh Gurjar became only the second Indian to win a gold at the World Para Athletics Championships, winning one in javelin at the 2017 edition in London. In the F46 category, Sundar recorded his personal best effort of 60.36m on the very first night of the tournament and took the top honour.
